Author: grossenten98
Text: Honestly, my relationship with food has improved and even though I use MFP, I don’t stress as much over food. I’ll probably stick to using MFP since it’s comforting to me and it doesn’t get in the way of what I want to do that often

Author: grossenten98
Text: Same here. It’s all about the counting, it’s all about the consolation that the numbers give me and staying on point. I eat 2 meals a day and rarely 3 and 1 times, so my meals are huge, it’s difficult to just eat 100% intuitively since I’m trying so hard to reach macros ect
